actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from Department of Veterans Affairs, and Office of Management and Budget.
Committee on Veterans received executive comment from Department of Veterans Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate a means test applicable to determinations of eligibility of certain veterans for veterans hospital care and other care and services.
short_title: Veterans' Hospital Care Entitlement Fairness Act of 1990

summary.text: Veterans' Hospital Care Entitlement Fairness Act of 1990 - Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to terminate an income means test (requiring a person to show an inability to defray necessary expenses due to lack of income) applicable to determinations of eligibility of certain veterans for hospital care, nursing home care, and outpatient medical services.

titles.title: Veterans' Hospital Care Entitlement Fairness Act of 1990
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to eliminate a means test applicable to determinations of eligibility of certain veterans for veterans hospital care and other care and services.
